#Question 1
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
movie_data <- read_csv("movies.csv")
```
#Question 2

```{r}
movies_selected <- select(movie_data, title, runtime, budget)
```
#Question 3
```{r}
movies_selected %>%
  summarise(count = sum(is.na(title)))
movies_selected %>% 
summarise(count = sum(is.na(runtime)))
movies_selected %>% 
  summarise(count = sum(is.na(budget)))
```

#Question 4
```{r}
movies_runtime <- movies_selected %>% 
  mutate(runtime = na_if (runtime, "NA")) %>% 
  mutate(runtime = na_if (runtime, "0"))

movies_runtime %>% 
summarise(count = sum(is.na(runtime)))
```
#Question 5
```{r}
movies_imputed <- movies_runtime %>% 
  mutate(runtime = coalesce(runtime, median(runtime, na.rm = TRUE)))

movies_imputed %>% 
summarise(count = sum(is.na(runtime)))


```
#Question 6
```{r}
movies_imputed %>% 
  slice_max(runtime, n = 10)

movies_imputed %>% 
slice_min(runtime, n = 10)
```
#Question 7

```{r}
movies_imputed %>% 
  select(budget) %>% 
  mutate(budget = if_else(budget < 100, median(budget), budget))
```
